TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TiffBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class TiffBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定義用來編碼標記的影像檔案格式 (TIFF) 格式影像的編碼器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]點陣圖格式支援畫面格層級的縮圖、 多個框架，以及框架層級的中繼資料。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] bitmap format supports frame level thumbnails, multiple frames, and frame level metadata. 它不支援全域預覽、 全域的縮圖或全域中繼資料。It does not support global preview, global thumbnails, or global metadata. 編碼無法在部分信任中運作。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)的部分信任的詳細資訊。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.
